dict.string: VC Copilot needs microphone access to record meeting audio and transcribe conversations in real-time.
VC Copilot needs camera access to capture slides during the meeting.
VC Copilot needs photo library access to upload slides from your device.
VC Copilot needs Bluetooth access to connect to Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2 glasses for audio input/output.
VC Copilot needs Bluetooth access to connect to Ray-Ban Meta Gen 2 glasses.
